mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_opinionComment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') regdate FROM t_opinionComment WHERE ref_group=#{num} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC
